items.summary: Replace the Arduino sketch displayed in `frontend/src/components/sections/ArduinoCodeSection.tsx` with the exact user-provided code (DHT11 on pin 6, relay on pin 8 active-LOW, LED on pin 12, 2-second sampling, fanState memory, 27°C ON / 26°C OFF hysteresis).

Update all Arduino Code section user-facing text in `frontend/src/components/sections/ArduinoCodeSection.tsx` to accurately describe the provided sketch (DHT11 on pin 6, relay-controlled fan on pin 8 active LOW, LED indicator on pin 12, 2-second sampling, and hysteresis 27°C ON / 26°C OFF). Ensure all user-facing text is English.

Update `frontend/src/siteConfig.ts` to keep site configuration and marketing copy consistent with the new fan-control logic: set `temperatureThresholdC` to 27, and update any copy that states a 28°C threshold to reflect the 27°C ON / 26°C OFF hysteresis behavior (including overview/features/SEO strings where applicable).
